segments.text: Hello , Could you please connect me to Mr . Cook's office ? It is on Line Three .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid you've got the wrong extension number .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh . Then I don't know what his number is . Can you check it for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr.Cook is on Line Six . I'll put you through .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . You helped me a lot .
segments.speaker: S1
